charges.charge_description: ACTIVITIES RE MATERIAL CONSTITUTING/CONTAINING CHILD PORNO 18:2252(a)(4)(B) Possession of Child Pornography(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is sentenced to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of imprisonment for 30 months with a 5-year term of supervised release to follow; forfeiture ordered; $10,000 fine; $100 special assessment to the Crime Victims Fund. On 2/25/2019, The Court finds the Defendant violated his term of Supervised Release and revokes S/R. Defendant is sentenced to the custody of the BOP for 5 years, 24 months of which will be served consecutively to the term of imprisonment in case 4:18-cr-212, with no term of supervised released to follow.

charges.charge_description: ACTIVITIES RE MATERIAL CONSTITUTING/ CONTAINING CHILD PORNO 18:2252(a)(2) Distribution of Child Pornography(1)
